WorkItem.Description: Would be cool to be able to import your raid team from wow-heroes/armory type system in order to fill out the buffs. This would alleviate having to know which buffs every single raid member was currently equiped with. Would also be nice if rawr optimized who casts what buff on selected encounter  and reported on the calculations.

Comments.Message: You can use the Raid Buffs by Raid Members button.

I guess I meant more of a Rawr for Buffs, Bawr if you will.......I personally run a raid and haven't been in WoW long enough to know everyone's best case scenario buff for every fight. The easier it is for a raid leader to know exactly who to tell to buff what....just seems like it would be easier imho.

You can find a tool that I think fits your needs perfectly on MMO-Champion :-

http://raidcomp.mmo-champion.com/
